metadata.title: CVE-2013-2213 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The KRandom::random function in KDE Paste Applet after 4.10.5 inkdeplasma-addons uses the GNU C Library rand function's linear congruentialgenerator, which makes it easier for context-dependent attackers to defeatcryptographic protection mechanisms by predicting the generator output.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2213` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

kdeplasma-addons-data - 4:5.5.5-0ubuntu1
kwin-addons - 4:5.5.5-0ubuntu1
plasma-dataengines-addons - 4:5.5.5-0ubuntu1
plasma-runners-addons - 4:5.5.5-0ubuntu1
plasma-wallpapers-addons - 4:5.5.5-0ubuntu1
plasma-widgets-addons - 4:5.5.5-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: kdeplasma-addons package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:5.5.5-0ubuntu1').
